name: Travel Corporation (Prototype)
description:
Travel Corp is a 2D platformer that revolves around wall jumping. 

Aria, a young girl with no future in mind finds herself in a dimension filled with monsters and mysterious lights. 

How to play:  

1. WASD to move

1. Space to jump

1. To wall jump, press space while on the wall to move as if you are wall jumping.

BEFORE YOU DOWNLOAD: This is the bare minimum of what a prototype is, much of this will change and be fixed. So if you do want to play this, be prepared to handle not finished gfxs,  glitches, and broken mechanics
